html:
10.11.19  12:28 am   Have you ever specifically made an effort to appeal to people who are high on psychedelic drugs? 

      that seems like a noble pursuit and it might have been one of my aims when i was younger, long before i was able to actually deliver on that appeal

10.11.19  12:27 am   What is your life like ?

     purely ridiculous

      Are u able to sustain your life from your videos?

     hopefully just long enough to invent the wheel. wait i just remembered someone already invented the wheel, but i was thinking maybe i could invent the ball

      I have so many questions. 

      me too

10.11.19  12:21 am   what are your intentions 

      formulate a textual response to your textual input

10.11.19  12:05 am   Why do things exist?

      because it would be purely ridiculous

10.10.19  11:48 pm   You make it all look effortless... You're so good!! But I'm beginning to suspect that once upon a time you were just like me, and then you worked and worked until the music came naturally. Is that an accurate view?

      not quite, music always came naturally, but i worked anyway, to make sure that it came even more naturally, in even more ways. and also so that some of the other non-musical elements could come more naturally than they may have before. become a triple, quadruple, n-tuple threat, if at all possible

10.10.19  11:27 pm   Your videos always help when I am having a rough day. Do you think you'll post again?

      that all depends if i make a video or other postable item. yes

10.10.19  11:26 pm   What does art do?

      gives you that "wow" feeling but it might not work if you call it art

10.10.19  11:11 pm   Do you get good sleep regularly?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

10.10.19  10:49 pm   piano or drums?

      i wonder if you could combine the 2 somehow

10.10.19  10:42 pm   I can't sing at all, but I'm going to learn so I can sing about my feelings and feel better. What set of steps do you recommend?

      you may not like this strategy, but you could fall upon hard times

10.10.19  10:41 pm   why doesnt my phone work after i dunked it in pool of sprite?

      the phone donated it's capabilities to the sprite. drink the sprite, now you will become phone

10.10.19  9:43 pm   do you find yourself procrastinating when making videos?

      no

10.10.19  9:15 pm   for halloween are you gonna be a lozenge

      that sounds like a good idea but i can't really remember when halloween is

10.10.19  9:02 pm   what is your productivity tip of the day?

      figure out what you are doing

10.10.19  8:53 pm   Why are the plate tectonics so angry all the time?

      i think most of the time they are very tranquil, calm

10.10.19  8:41 pm   hey bill why are you so mYsTeRiOuS

      possibly as a reflection of the wider world

10.10.19  8:23 pm   i showed my friend a few of your videos and he had no idea what was going on. what do you think is the best way to introduce him to this side of the internet?

      the internet has no sides because it's made of liquid, but i don't really advocate showing someone too much of something they don't seem to be very interested in

10.10.19  8:20 pm   would you say the kind of stuff you do is more surreal or abstract?

      if it actually is either one, then it's gonna be difficult to measure well enough to compare

10.10.19  8:04 pm   Next vid when?

      i was thinking of making a countdown timer

10.10.19  7:18 pm    Do you know what it's like to push everyone you've ever met away?

     yes

      How could someone overcome that?

      you're gonna wanna go ahead and start bringing people closer

10.10.19  6:49 pm   What is your favorite type of art.

      surprise

10.10.19  6:19 pm   do you play guitar

     not really

      and if so how'd you learn to play it?

      being around a lot of guitars, and guitar players

10.10.19  5:50 pm   Are u gonna upload m8

      that depends if i make a video or other item that's uploadable. yes

10.10.19  5:28 pm   Ever played a French Horn?

      no

10.10.19  5:27 pm   i'm about to come up with an original question 

      oh that's exciting

10.10.19  5:17 pm   should i learn how to play piano?

      only if you want to

10.10.19  5:14 pm   how much spare time do you have?

      as much as i want. wait what the heck is spare time

10.10.19  4:48 pm   how do you log random ideas when lying awake in bed

      the best way might be to use an audio recording device. i think all smartphones have them, but if you don't feel like buying a smartphone you could just buy an audio recording device for probably way cheaper

10.10.19  4:27 pm   Would autotune on vocals considered cheating?

      cheating on what

10.10.19  3:58 pm   Are you into VR?

      i will be by the time it is ubiquitously commonplace. hopefully well before that actually

10.10.19  3:48 pm   i was thinking about the fact that video seems like the definitive format. audio + video, with great freedom. touch, taste and smell won't be added soon, and aren't as important. but there's one thing you can add... interactivity. ever thought about making something interactive?

     yes

      like a game or similar. or would that be too hard/require too much effort?

     hard/effort is not as important as time. time admittedly would be much less of a factor if general mortality were not a factor

      is this page the interactive format?

      yes

10.10.19  3:04 pm   hi there is a person who i was friends with who might be crazy but i don't want to say she is crazy because i want to give her the benefit of the doubt, but i think she uses the fact that i am one of the only people who gives her the benefit of the doubt to isolate and control me because she makes me feel crazy and that no one else but her knows the truth about the world and then i stop trusting other people and then have no choice but to believe her since that's the only person i am talking to. should i write a book about my absurd experiences?

      sure, or some videos, or music

10.10.19  1:32 pm   10.8.19  11:12 pm not my question but they said bVII  which would be the flat seven chord, Bb. Db would be the bII chord.  

      sorry, i'm lousy at reading roman numerals. they look kind of like letters to me. actually they look like a pile of sticks, in a utility closet. in any case, i was describing b2 (flat 2)

10.10.19  1:18 pm   why are artists artists?

      because you said so

10.10.19  12:51 pm   10.10.19  12:48 am does tempo reset after 1000? idgi

      some programs probably don't go past 999. it's kind of useless unless you want to easily create a jackhammer effect

10.10.19  12:33 pm   do you ever just e x i s t?

      sort of

10.10.19  12:21 pm   is the "sexy lamp" in "hello sexy pants" a metaphor for something larger,

     not when it's first mentioned. it has a very small, unassuming role

      such as the sun (which is much larger than a lamp)? or is it a literal lamp which was providing light for you at 3am in order for you to see the work that you were doing?

     i think when it says it lights the entire sky, it becomes understood as something larger

10.10.19  12:15 pm   what are your thoughts on maple trees?

      a lot of people lick them, not knowing what they're getting into

10.10.19  12:00 pm   do you store your butter inside the fridge or outside the fridge ?
 

      i have a butter fridge

10.10.19  10:15 am   what's your favorite polyrhythm?

      4:3

10.10.19  7:47 am   garlic?

      could come in handy

10.10.19  7:05 am   How do you make your videos?

      we'll see

10.10.19  6:04 am   thoughts on the clairnet ?

      mostly harmless, i'd say

10.10.19  6:00 am   What form do you usually show in public when you go to Walmart?

     business shopper

     
And what hat do you wear?

      if i told you then i'd have to change it

10.10.19  2:23 am   Do you listen to any latin music?

     yes

      Which?

     mostly whenever i hear it in a car driving by, i really like the big band stuff with a horn section, tempo around 90bpm, and the bass is doing this

10.10.19  1:54 am   From a mental health perspective, are you feeling alright?  

      yes

10.10.19  1:51 am   What is your favorite poem?

      'by using this site you consent to our use of cookies'

10.10.19  12:52 am   is "wet" a quality of just water (as in, that is what water does to things), or does it apply to all liquids?

      i've been informed by experts far more knowledgable than myself, that nothing is wet. there is no such thing as wet. calling something 'wet' is just one of the many pitfalls we all can make, in a social setting, if we are not well enough trained and informed

10.10.19  12:49 am   are you gonna write something new or take something from the vault for your next song?

      probably a little of both

10.10.19  12:48 am   what the fastest tempo you've used in your songs?

      999 i guess
